text:
September 24, 1952
Mr. Seymour H. Siegel
President, NAEB
WNYC, Municipal Broadcasting System
2500 Municipal Building
New York 7, N. Y.
Dear Sy:
Welcome home!
I*ve replied to every inquiry, aeknowle<
receipt of every order on THE JEPFEHS jNIAN HERITAGE series.
Ifve enclosed fact sheet and one folder with each letter.
Copy of form letters used also attached.
I trust my fact sheet is accurate, but I had to
get out the information, and it was accurate to the best
of my knowledge. You know, ol1 boy, it was all news to
me when I saw my names in the ads.
When you want the compiled dope, including
mailing list, 1*11 tabulate and let you have. When, sir?
When you have more exact data on shipping,
release, etc., I111 get out another fact sheet to all
stations.
Incidentally, Horton report practically in
shape to submit proofs to Horton for checking. S my the
copy submitted to me by Dallas last Saturday afternoon, and
will be in hopper next week, I hope.
Prank E. Schooley
Treasurer
PESsfmh
Enel.
cc - blind - J. M^les
